    5/26/2023

    ç¨‹åºå‘˜æ ¹æœ¬ä¸ä¼šæœ‰35å²å±æœºï¼ï¼ï¼

    å‘¨æœ«ï¼Œæˆ‘æ²¡æœ‰å‡ºå»ï¼Œåˆæ¥äº†ä¸ªå•å­ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªç½‘å‹è®©æˆ‘ç”¨Node+vueåšä¸€ä¸ªå•†åŸç³»ç»Ÿã€‚

    å…¶å®webå¼€å‘ï¼Œå¥½å¤šè¯­è¨€çš„åå°é€»è¾‘å¤„ç†éƒ½æ˜¯åƒç¯‡ä¸€å¾‹ï¼Œå­¦å¥½ä¸€é—¨è¯­è¨€å¯ä»¥æ¨ªæ‰«å…¶ä»–è¯­è¨€ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å­¦å¥½å•¥è¯­è¨€éƒ½æœ‰å‰é€”ã€‚

    é«˜è–ªã€996ã€ç§ƒé¡¶ã€æ ¼å­è¡«â€¦â€¦

    è¿™éƒ½æ˜¯å¤–ç•Œç»™ç¨‹åºå‘˜çš„å¸½å­ã€‚

    æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€åå¤šå¹´å¼€å‘çš„ç¨‹åºå‘˜ï¼Œä»æœ¬ç§‘åˆ°ç¡•å£«ä¸€ç›´é‡è¯•è®¡ç®—æœºç›¸å…³çš„å·¥ä½œï¼ŒåŸºæœ¬ä¹Ÿæ˜¯è§è¯äº†è¿™ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šçš„èµ·èµ·è½è½ã€‚

    å…¶å®å¤–ç•Œçš„å£°éŸ³ä¸é‡è¦çš„ï¼Œå…³é”®æ˜¯åšè‡ªå·±å§ï¼ä»Šå¹´å’ŒåŒè¡ŒèŠä¸€ä¸‹ï¼š

    35å²æœ‰æ²¡æœ‰èŒä¸šå±æœºï¼

    ä»æˆ‘çš„èŒåœºç»éªŒæ¥çœ‹ï¼Œ35å²æ²¡æœ‰å±æœºï¼Œåè€Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯è¶Šæ¥è¶Šåƒé¦™ï¼Œè–ªèµ„è¶Šæ¥è¶Šé«˜ï¼

    é‚£ä»€ä¹ˆæ ·çš„ç¨‹åºå‘˜å®¹æ˜“æ·˜æ±°???

    åœæ»ä¸å‰ï¼Œä¸€ç›´ä¸å­¦ä¹ ï¼Œ35å²çš„æ—¶å€™è¿˜æ˜¯ä¸€é¡¿CRUDï¼ˆå¢åˆ æ”¹æŸ¥ï¼‰!ä½ è¯´ä¸è¾é€€ä½ è¾é€€è°ï¼Ÿ

    å½“ç„¶åˆ°äº†35å²ï¼Œåœ¨å­¦ä¹ èƒ½åŠ›å’ŒåŠ ç­æ–¹é¢ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¯”ä¸ä¸Šåº”å±Šç”Ÿã€‚

    ä½†æ˜¯ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨æŠ€æœ¯ã€ç®¡ç†æ–¹é¢å»ºç«‹ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼Œå½“ç„¶ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å¼€å‘å…¼èŒï¼Œå…¼èŒå¯ä»¥åšå“ªäº›ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ

    å’¨è¯¢ã€æ¥ç§æ´»ã€è‡ªåª’ä½“ç­‰ã€‚

    è¿™äº›éšä¾¿åšèµ·æ¥ä¸€ä¸ªéƒ½å¯ä»¥è¶…è¿‡ä½ ä¸Šç­çš„å·¥èµ„ã€‚æˆ‘æ›¾ç»åšå»ä¼ä¸šåšè¿‡ä¸€æ¬¡å’¨è¯¢ï¼Œç»™äº†äº”ä½æ•°ï¼ŒTobæ˜¯çœŸçš„é¦™ï¼ä¸Šæ¬¡å’Œæˆ‘å¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‹å‹åƒé¥­ï¼Œä»–æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæœ¬ç§‘ç”Ÿï¼Œä¸€ç›´åšNLPï¼Œä¸Šå‘¨å»å¤§å­¦ä»£è¯¾ï¼Œä¸€ä¸Šåˆç»™äº†4500ã€‚

    æ‰€ä»¥35å²è¿˜å¹´è½»ï¼Œäºç¨‹åºå‘˜æ¥è¯´ï¼Œæœ‰å¤ªå¤šçš„è½¬å‹çš„æ–¹å‘ï¼Œæˆ‘è§‰å¾—ç¨‹åºå‘˜35å²å¤±ä¸šå°±æ˜¯Pè¯ï¼ï¼ï¼

    ä¸‹é¢çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹å¼€å‘çš„è¿™ä¸ªç³»ç»Ÿã€‚

    # ä¸€ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿç•Œé¢

    # äºŒï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿæ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç å±•ç¤º

    // å°å­Ÿv:jishulearn
<template>
	<view class="cart">
		<!--<view class="header" :style="{ position: headerPosition, top: headerTop }">-->
			<!--<view class="title">è´­ç‰©è½¦</view>-->
		<!--</view>-->
		<!--&lt;!&ndash; å ä½ &ndash;&gt;-->
		<!--<view class="place"></view>-->
		<!-- è´­ç‰©è½¦ä¸ºç©º -->
		<view v-if="cartList.length === 0" class="empty">
			<text class="iconfont icongouwuche" :class="'text-'+themeColor.name"></text>
			<view v-if="hasLogin" class="empty-tips">
				ç©ºç©ºå¦‚ä¹Ÿ
				<navigator
					class="navigator"
					:class="'text-'+themeColor.name"
					v-if="hasLogin"
					url="../category/category"
					open-type="switchTab"
					>éšä¾¿é€›é€›></navigator
				>
			</view>
			<view v-else class="empty-tips">
				ç©ºç©ºå¦‚ä¹Ÿ
				<view class="navigator" :class="'text-'+themeColor.name" @tap="navTo('/pages/public/logintype')"
					>ç™»å½•/æ³¨å†Œ ></view
				>
			</view>
		</view>
		<!-- è´­ç‰©è½¦åˆ—è¡¨ -->
		<view class="goods-list" v-else>
			<view class="rf-cart-row" v-for="(row, index) in cartList" :key="index">
				<!-- åˆ é™¤æŒ‰é’® -->
				<view class="menu" @tap.stop="deleteCartItem(row.id, 'one')"  :class="'bg-'+themeColor.name">
					<text class="iconfont icon iconiconfontshanchu1"></text>
				</view>
				<!-- å•†å“ -->
				<view
					class="carrier"
					:class="[
						theIndex === index ? 'open' : oldIndex === index ? 'close' : ''
					]"
					@touchstart="touchStart(index, $event)"
					@touchmove="touchMove(index, $event)"
					@touchend="touchEnd(index, $event)"
				>
					<!-- checkbox -->
					<view class="checkbox-box" @tap="selected(index, row)">
						<view
							class="checkbox"
							:class="[
								parseInt(row.status, 10) === 0 ? `checkbox-disabled ${'text-'+themeColor.name}` : 'text-'+themeColor.name
							]"
						>
							<view :class="[row.selected ? `on ${'bg-'+themeColor.name}` : '']"></view>
						</view>
					</view>
					<!-- å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯ -->
					<view class="goods-info">
						<view class="img">
							<image :src="row.productPic"></image>
						</view>
						<view class="info">
							<view
								class="title in2line"
								@tap="navTo(`/pages/product/product?id=${row.product.id}`)"
							>
								{{ row.productName }}
							</view>
							<view class="state-wrapper">
								<view class="spec" @tap.stop="toggleSpec(row)">{{ row.productAttr|attrFilter}}</view>
								<view class="state" v-if="parseInt(row.status, 10) === 0">
									å·²å¤±æ•ˆ
								</view>
							</view>
							<view class="price-number">
								<view class="price">{{ moneySymbol }}{{
									row.price
								}}</view>
								<view class="remark" >{{ row.remark }}</view>
								<view class="number" >
									<view class="sub" @tap.stop="sub(row, index)">
										<text class="iconfont icon icon-jianhao"></text>
									</view>
									<view class="input" @tap.stop="discard">
										<input
											type="number"
											:class="'text-'+themeColor.name"
											v-model="row.quantity"
											@input.stop="numberChange(row, $event, index)"
										/>
									</view>
									<view class="add" @tap.stop="add(row, index)">
										<text class="iconfont icon iconjia1"></text>
									</view>
								</view>
							</view>
						</view>
					</view>
				</view>
			</view>
		</view>
		<!-- è„šéƒ¨èœå• -->
		<view
			class="footer"
			:style="{ bottom: footerbottom }"
			v-if="cartList.length !== 0"
		>
			<view class="checkbox-box" @tap="allSelect">
				<view class="checkbox" :class="'text-'+themeColor.name">
					<view :class="[isAllselected ? `on ${'bg-'+themeColor.name}` : '']"></view>
				</view>
				<view class="text">å…¨é€‰</view>
			</view>
			<view
				class="delBtn"
				:class="'text-'+themeColor.name"
				@tap="deleteCartItem"
				v-if="selectedList.length > 0"
				>åˆ é™¤</view
			>
			<view class="settlement">
				<view class="sum"
					>åˆè®¡:
					<view class="money">{{ moneySymbol }}{{ sumPrice }}</view>
				</view>
				<view class="btn" :class="'bg-'+themeColor.name" @tap="createOrder"
					>ç»“ç®—({{ selectedList.length }})</view
				>
			</view>
		</view>
		<!-- è§„æ ¼-æ¨¡æ€å±‚å¼¹çª— -->
		<view
			class="popup spec show"
			v-if="specClass === 'show'"
			@touchmove.stop.prevent="stopPrevent"
			@tap="hideSpec"
		>
			<!-- é®ç½©å±‚ -->
			<view class="mask" @tap="hideSpec"></view>
			<view class="layer" @tap.stop="stopPrevent">
				<rf-attr-content
					:isSelectedNum="false"
					:product="productDetail"
					@toggle="toggleSpec"
					></rf-attr-content>
			</view>
		</view>
		<!--é¡µé¢åŠ è½½åŠ¨ç”»-->
		<rfLoading isFullScreen :active="loading"></rfLoading>
	</view>
</template>
<script>
import {
	cartItemClear,
	cartItemDel,
	cartItemList,
	cartItemUpdateNum,
	cartItemUpdateSku,
	productDetail
} from '@/api/product';
import rfAttrContent from '@/components/rf-attr-content';
import { mapMutations } from 'vuex';
export default {
  components: { rfAttrContent },
	filters:{
		attrFilter(val){
			if(!val) return ;
			val = JSON.parse(val);
			let res = [];
			val.map(v=>{
				res.push(v.value);
			})
			return res.join(',');
		}
	},
	data() {
		return {
			sumPrice: '0.00',
			headerPosition: 'fixed',
			headerTop: null,
			statusTop: null,
			showHeader: true,
			selectedList: [],
			isAllselected: false,
			// æ§åˆ¶æ»‘åŠ¨æ•ˆæœ
			theIndex: null,
			oldIndex: null,
			isStop: false,
			cartList: [],
			hasLogin: null,
			footerbottom: 0,
			specClass: 'none',
			productDetail: {
        base_attribute_format: [],
        sku: []
			},
			specSelected: [],
			specChildList: [],
			specList: [],
			currentSkuId: '',
			moneySymbol: this.moneySymbol,
			loading: true,
			singleSkuText: this.singleSkuText
		};
	},
	onPageScroll(e) {
		// å…¼å®¹iOSç«¯ä¸‹æ‹‰æ—¶é¡¶éƒ¨æ¼‚ç§»
		this.headerPosition = e.scrollTop >= 0 ? 'fixed' : 'absolute';
		this.headerTop = e.scrollTop >= 0 ? null : 0;
		this.statusTop = e.scrollTop >= 0 ? null : -this.statusHeight + 'px';
	},
	// ä¸‹æ‹‰åˆ·æ–°ï¼Œéœ€è¦è‡ªå·±åœ¨page.jsonæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­é…ç½®å¼€å¯é¡µé¢ä¸‹æ‹‰åˆ·æ–° "enablePullDownRefresh": true
	onPullDownRefresh() {
		this.selectedList.length = 0;
		this.isAllselected = false;
		this.sumPrice = 0;
		this.getCartItemList('refresh');
	},
	onShow() {
		// å…¼å®¹H5ä¸‹ç»“ç®—æ¡ä½ç½®
		// #ifdef H5
		this.footerbottom =
			document.getElementsByTagName('uni-tabbar')[0].offsetHeight + 'px';
		// #endif
		// #ifdef APP-PLUS
		this.showHeader = false;
		// eslint-disable-next-line
		this.statusHeight = plus.navigator.getStatusbarHeight();
		// #endif
		this.initData();
	},
	methods: {
		...mapMutations(['setCartNum']),

		// è§„æ ¼å¼¹çª—å¼€å…³
		toggleSpec(row) {
			if (parseInt(row.status, 10) === 0) return;
			if (this.specClass === 'show') {
				if (!this.hasLogin) {
					this.specClass = 'none';
					this.$mHelper.toast('è¯·å…ˆç™»å½•ï¼');
					return;
				}
				this.handleCartItemUpdateSku(this.currentSkuId, row.skuId);
				this.specClass = 'hide';
				setTimeout(() => {
					this.specClass = 'none';
				}, 250);
			} else if (this.specClass === 'none') {
				if (row) {
					this.getProductDetail(row);
				}
			}
		},
		// è·å–äº§å“è¯¦æƒ…
		async getProductDetail(row) {
			this.currentSkuId = row.sku_id;
			await this.$http
				.get(`${productDetail}`, {
					id: row.product_id
				})
				.then(async r => {
					this.productDetail = r.data;
					this.productDetail.sku_name = row.sku_name;
					this.specClass = 'show';
				});
		},
		hideSpec() {
			this.specClass = 'hide';
			setTimeout(() => {
				this.specClass = 'none';
			}, 250);
		},
		stopPrevent() {},
		// åˆ é™¤é€‰ä¸­è´­ç‰©è½¦å•†å“
		async deleteCartItem(id, type) {
			let ids = [];
			for (let i = 0; i < this.cartList.length; i++) {
				if (this.cartList[i].selected) {
					ids.push(parseInt(this.cartList[i].id, 10));
				}
			}
			await this.$http2.post("cart/delete",{ids},{
				header:{
					'content-type':'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
				}
			});
			this.selectedList.length = 0;
			this.isAllselected = false;
			this.sumPrice = 0;
			this.getCartItemList();
			this.oldIndex = null;
			this.theIndex = null;
			// await this.$http
			// 	.post(`${cartItemDel}`, {
			// 		sku_ids: JSON.stringify(skuIds)
			// 	})
			// 	.then(() => {
			// 		this.selectedList.length = 0;
			// 		this.isAllselected = false;
			// 		this.sumPrice = 0;
			// 		this.getCartItemList();
			// 		this.oldIndex = null;
			// 		this.theIndex = null;
			// 	});
		},
		// ä¿®æ”¹è´­ç‰©è½¦å•†å“sku
		async handleCartItemUpdateSku(skuId, newSkuId) {
			await this.$http
				.post(`${cartItemUpdateSku}`, {
					sku_id: skuId,
					new_sku_id: newSkuId
				})
				.then(() => {
					this.selectedList.length = 0;
					this.isAllselected = false;
					this.sumPrice = 0;
					this.getCartItemList();
				});
		},
		// æ•°æ®åˆå§‹åŒ–
		initData() {
			this.hasLogin = this.$mStore.getters.hasLogin;
			if (this.hasLogin) {
				this.theIndex = null;
				this.oldIndex = null;
				this.selectedList.length = 0;
				this.isAllselected = false;
				this.sumPrice = 0;
				this.getCartItemList();
			} else {
				this.cartList = [];
				this.selectedList.length = 0;
				this.loading = false;
			}
		},
		// é€šç”¨è·³è½¬
		navTo(route) {
			if (!this.$mStore.getters.hasLogin) {
				uni.setStorageSync('backToPage', JSON.stringify({ route: '/pages/cart/cart' }));
			}
			this.$mRouter.push({ route });
		},
		// è·å–è´­ç‰©è½¦åˆ—è¡¨
		async getCartItemList(type) {
			let r = await this.$http2.get('cart/list').catch(() => {
				this.cartList = [];
				this.loading = false;
				if (type === 'refresh') {
					uni.stopPullDownRefresh();
				}
			});
			this.loading = false;
			this.cartList = r.data;
			this.$set(this,'cartList',[...r.data]);
		// æ¸…ç©ºè´­ç‰©è½¦
		clearCart(params) {
			const content = params ? 'æ¸…ç©ºå¤±æ•ˆå•†å“ï¼Ÿ' : 'æ¸…ç©ºè´­ç‰©è½¦ï¼Ÿ';
			uni.showModal({
				content,
				success: async e => {
					if (e.confirm) {
						await this.$http.post(`${cartItemClear}`, params).then(() => {
							this.selectedList.length = 0;
							this.isAllselected = false;
							this.sumPrice = 0;
							this.getCartItemList();
						});
					}
				}
			});
		},
		// æ§åˆ¶å·¦æ»‘åˆ é™¤æ•ˆæœ
		touchStart(index, event) {
			// å¤šç‚¹è§¦æ§ä¸è§¦å‘
			if (event.touches.length > 1) {
				this.isStop = true;
				return;
			}
			this.oldIndex = this.theIndex;
			this.theIndex = null;
			// åˆå§‹åæ ‡
			this.initXY = [event.touches[0].pageX, event.touches[0].pageY];
		},

    # ä¸‰ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿å…³æ³¨æˆ‘

    å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³å­¦ä¹ æ›´å¤šçš„æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œå…³æ³¨ä¸‹æ–¹å…¬ä¼—å·ï¼Œå›å¤ï¼šé¡¹ç›®å¤§å…¨ï¼Œå¹²è´§ä¸æ–­ï¼

    å›½åº†èŠ‚ï¼Œä¸€å¤©å¼€å‘ä¸€ä¸ªå°ç¨‹åº+Webç³»ç»Ÿã€‚2.5Kåˆ°æ‰‹ã€‚ã€åˆ†äº«å¼€å‘ç»éªŒã€‘ã€æ”¶è—èµ·æ¥ã€‘ï¸ åŸºäºSpringBootç‚¹é¤å°ç¨‹åºçš„å¼€å‘ã€å‰åç«¯ã€‘ï¸
